alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 2:31AM PST until January 05 at 5:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...San Joaquin Valley and foothills from Fresno County southward. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Shallow rooted trees in saturated soils may be toppled.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
